name: Higemaru Makaijima: Nanatsu no Shima Daibouken
name_original: Higemaru Makaijima: Nanatsu no Shima Daibouken
description:
Higemaru Makaijima: Nanatsu no Shima Daibouken is an action game. It came out on 14-04-1987. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Higemaru Makaijima: Nanatsu no Shima Daibouken on NES.
